prop-001.title: Investigation into Local Housing Development
prop-001.summary: Looking into the recent approval of a controversial housing development and its potential environmental impact.
prop-001.description:
## Background
A large housing development was recently approved on the western edge of Miami, in an area previously designated as protected wetlands. The approval process happened quickly and with minimal public input.

## Investigation Goals
- Review the approval documentation and timeline
- Interview environmental experts about potential impacts
- Speak with local residents about their concerns
- Investigate potential connections between developers and city officials
- Explore alternatives that could balance housing needs with environmental protection

## Potential Impact
This investigation could bring transparency to development decisions that affect both our environment and housing availability in Miami. It may also establish a precedent for how future developments in sensitive areas are handled.

updates.content: Added additional research links on wetland preservation laws.
Two journalists have expressed interest in covering this story.
